item.title: Sonoff mini r2, my screw up and repair
item.author: gmail.com (Earving)
item.description: I bought a sonoff mini r2 with the intention to automate my bedroom light. It requires a neutral wire to work, so it was quite difficult to use in my room due to light is connected in a two way switch and it does not have neutral wire.
